Package com.github.actionfx.core.bind

Interface BindingTargetResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver, MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver, NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
    public interface BindingTargetResolver
    Interface for resolving a field into a control that acts as a binding target.
    Author:
    koster

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolve​(java.lang.Object bean, View view)
      Resolves the given bean and view to a list of BindingTarget describing the relation between controls inside the view and a field value inside a bean hierarchy.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolve​(java.lang.Object bean,
                                      View view)
        Resolves the given bean and view to a list of BindingTarget describing the relation between controls inside the view and a field value inside a bean hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        bean - the root bean instance holding values to bind to controls
        view - the view holing controls
        Returns:
        the resolved BindingTargets
